statements: UPDATE quest_missions SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE quest_id = 1 AND mission_id = 3;
UPDATE quest_missions SET objective = 'Defeat the Boss', completion_status = FALSE WHERE mission_id = 5 AND quest_id = 2;
UPDATE quest_missions SET objective = 'Defeat the Dragon' WHERE quest_id = 1 AND mission_id = 3;
UPDATE quest_missions SET completion_status = TRUE, objective = 'Retrieve the Magic Amulet' WHERE mission_id = 2 AND quest_id = 5;
UPDATE quests SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE quest_id = 1;
UPDATE missions SET mission_description = 'New Description', completion_status = FALSE WHERE mission_id = 3;
UPDATE quests SET quest_description='Explore the enchanted forest', completion_status=TRUE, quest_name='Forest Adventure' WHERE quest_id=1
UPDATE missions SET mission_description='Retrieve the ancient artifact from the temple ruins', completion_status=FALSE, mission_name='Temple Expedition' WHERE mission_id=3
UPDATE quests SET quest_name = 'New Quest Name', quest_description = 'Updated quest description' WHERE quest_id = 1;
UPDATE missions SET mission_description = 'Completed mission successfully', completion_status = TRUE WHERE mission_id = 3;
UPDATE quests SET quest_name = 'New Quest', completion_status = TRUE WHERE quest_id = 1;
UPDATE missions SET mission_description = 'Updated mission description', completion_status = FALSE, mission_name = 'Mission A' WHERE mission_id = 2;
UPDATE quests SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE quest_id = 1;
UPDATE missions SET mission_name = 'Rescue Mission', completion_status = FALSE WHERE mission_id = 2;
UPDATE quests SET quest_name = 'New Quest Name' WHERE quest_id = 3
UPDATE missions SET completion_status = true, completion_status = false WHERE mission_name = 'Explore the Forest'
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, player_experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE missions SET mission_description = 'Updated mission description', completion_status = 'completed' WHERE mission_id = 3;
UPDATE quests SET quest_description = 'New Description', completion_status = 'in progress' WHERE quest_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, player_experience = player_experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 5;
